links.fullPhosphorylationEffect: The effect of Yes Tyr-32 phosphorylation is unclear.
Yes Tyr-426 phosphorylation stimulates phosphotransferase activity. This phosphosite is located in the kinase activation loop between catalytic subdomains VII and VIII.
Yes Tyr-537 phosphorylation inhibits phosphotransferase activity.
CSK Tyr-304 phosphorylation stimulates phosphotransferase activity.
